props.title: Requests per second
props.query: SELECT average(`nginx.server.net.requestsPerSecond`) as 'Requests' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Active connections
props.hint: Number of connections that are currently active.
props.query: SELECT average(`nginx.server.net.connectionsActive`) as 'Active connections' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Connections accepted per second
props.hint: Number of accepted client connections per second.
props.query: SELECT average(`nginx.server.net.connectionsAcceptedPerSecond`) as 'Connections accepted' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Connections dropped per second
props.hint: Number of connections per second that were accepted but could not be handled and hence dropped.
props.query: SELECT average(`nginx.server.net.connectionsDroppedPerSecond`) as 'Connections dropped' FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
